remarks: Definition of the conditional operator for propositions.  See ~ bj-dfif2 , ~ bj-dfif3 , ~ bj-dfif4 , ~ bj-dfif5 , ~ bj-dfif6 and ~ bj-dfif7 for alternate definitions.  (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)
statement: df-bj-if $p |- ( if- ( ph , ps , ch ) <-> ( ( ph -> ps ) /\ ( -. ph -> ch ) ) ) $.
